__e: Soon, it will be time for you to help me gather the power.
It means we're dealing with forces beyond the power of man.
You will need it before you set out again to your place.
If you really wanna get out of here, you have to keep up your strength.
Look, you made a mistake, but... you have to stay strong.
If we are to help the people that come here... we must keep up our strength.
I understand your father continues to gain his strength.
But I would only say that he will, in all likelihood, regain his health.
I need you to stay where you are, at least until you're strong enough.
With powers like yours, I'm afraid we can't let you just walk away.
..and you know, therefore, the forces that now rally to my side, and I make no boast of it, I promise you that.
